1370: Eligius moved to Corte gracht.B.1 after marriage.
Got married to Sarre at age 31 in 1370.
Had a son with Sarre, Eghenonis, at age 31.
1371: Had a son with Sarre, Rembrandus, at age 32.
Lost son Rembrandus when Rembrandus was 1 years old.
1372: Had a daughter with Sarre, Esa, at age 33.
1373: Had a son with Sarre, Ysewin, at age 34.
1376: Had a son with Sarre, Curdiin, at age 37.
1377: Lost his wife Sarre while she was giving birth to Blomart in 1377.
Became caretaker of Eghenonis, Esa, Ysewin, Curdiin, Blomart at age 39.
1378: Lost daughter Esa when Esa was 7 years old.
